alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 11:30AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Santa Cruz, northwestern San Benito, south central Santa Clara and northwestern Monterey Counties through 1145 AM PST... At 1130 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Uvas Canyon Park to near Freedom. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watsonville, Gilroy, Morgan Hill, Corralitos, Brown Valley Road, Freedom, Eureka Canyon Road, Uvas Canyon Park, Amesti, Interlaken, Prunedale, San Martin, Aromas, Aptos Hills-Larkin Valley, Pajaro, Aptos Hills-Larkin, Las Lomas and Day Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
